Articles.Content:
So what will you do to make your kerbals happier? (Or even more terrified).

I will try to give kerbals more fun.
"New Years Resolution: Moar boosters." -Jeb-
.. play less KSP. Is my resolution lol.
Moar struts!!

1. Grow Beard
  2. Visit every celestial body in KSP
  3. Make more KSP videos
  4. Make better KSP videos

The new year holds some interesting prospects.
Maybe start Streaming KSP
2560 x 1600 sorry had to be done!

2560 x 1600 sorry had to be done!

I was here for that!
Don't kill Jeb.
In the fine tradition of making new years resolutions I have no intention of keeping, I therefore promise to make sleek and efficient spacecraft with modest part counts.
Land and return on Tylo and Laythe, only two places I haven't done that.

Land on Vall. Write a story about it.

Land on Eeloo. Write a story about it.

Land on Moho. Write a story about it.

Do a Jool Tour. Write a story about it.

Do a Grand Tour. Can you guess?

Lots more tales coming, people!
Get to jool

Finish so many projects......

And maybe actually play KSP for fun when I finish them!...

Who am I kidding... making ships for people to fly IS fun!

Happy new year all. If 2013 is anything to go by Squad will blow our minds in 2014!

In the fine tradition of making new years resolutions I have no intention of keeping, I therefore promise to make sleek and efficient spacecraft with modest part counts.

*grumbling* wait, what? modest?... there is something strange afoot here...

Play more KSP!

...wait...then I won't have time to sleep.

Ah, sleep is overated.

Jedlas says 'Happy New Year' from Epoch Ridge!

(We'll send him a rescue mission... eventually. )

Burn it all!

And crash the forums again with the announcement of 0.24, 0.25 and (hopefully) 0.26 and 0.27

I want to help the community more. I want this to be the most skilled and competent playerbase in gaming. As an "endgame" player, I want to make sure that newer players are not daunted by the game, and that they reach the full potential of KSP. I will start on this when I wake up!
Don't make any resolutions and don't go to a new year's party where drunkards will do foolish things.

In the fine tradition of making new years resolutions I have no intention of keeping, I therefore promise to make sleek and efficient spacecraft with modest part counts.

Wait, what?

WHAT?!!?

HAS THE WORLD GONE MAD!?!?!?!?

Wait, what?

WHAT?!!?

HAS THE WORLD GONE MAD!?!?!?!?

New Years resolutions are almost ALWAYS broken. Don't worry.

New Years resolutions are almost ALWAYS broken. Don't worry.

But whackjob almost never gives up!

New Years resolutions are almost ALWAYS broken. Don't worry.

And this is why I don't make resolutions. I *might* do things, but I won't promise anything.

Happy new year!

I just announced a paid vacation for all my astronauts. Made sure they all are on E... I mean Kerbin.

They will get to visit their... hmm... sporemates? down under the surface, in one of those cities I'd so much like to see. And spend a week with them, telling stories. Jeb especially, I mean, he's just back from Duna : )
